alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued December 17 at 9:32PM CST until December 17 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central Bayfield County in northwestern Wisconsin... Northwestern Iron County in northwestern Wisconsin... West central Ashland County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 930 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located 8 miles west of Barksdale, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This snow squall will impact the US-2 corridor between Iron River and Ashland. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Washburn, Sanborn, Iron River, Barksdale, Oulu, Drummond, Marengo, Gurney, Ino, Town of Delta, Benoit, Odanah, Namekagon Lake, Mason, Bad River Reservation, Cedar, High Bridge, Birch Hill, and Grand View. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED
